nodes.text: Cranan 12, or simply Cranan, was a planet in the Arkanis sector of the Outer Rim.

Cranan 12 was a thriving planet, rich in ores and minerals. It was the only world controlled and exploited by the Mining Guild in the Arkanis sector. Most shipments from Cranan were sent to Excarga, by the Cranan-Excarga Route, a situation the sector authorities on Arkanis have tried to reverse through a combination of inducements and threats.
